title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram Necklace
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (6.36 carats). Hyderabadi Polish finish.
features: A stunning statement haaram featuring a cascading design of emeralds and diamonds. Oval-cut emeralds are meticulously bezel-set and interspersed with diamond-studded gold clusters. The diamond accents are designed in a floral vine pattern, leading to a central emerald pendant. The necklace incorporates a traditional South Indian layered aesthetic.
colors: Vibrant emerald green contrasted with the dazzling sparkle of white diamonds and the warm glow of yellow gold
creating a rich and luxurious palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings
and other special occasions. This haaram is a beautiful heirloom piece
suitable for bridal wear or to elevate any formal ensemble.
description: This Grand Haaram is a symbol of prosperity and elegance. The rich emeralds, combined with the dazzling diamonds and pure gold, make it a captivating piece of art. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it truly radiant. This timeless design is sure to be treasured for generations.
